Hi there, 

I'm having a strange problem with Heritrix. When I criate a sim=
ple
job, consisting with one or more seeds from the same domain (eg:
http:/=
/www.zzz.com.br/ and http://www.zzz.com.br/aaa), and create an
exclude filt=
er with the URIRegExpFilter, the URI's that are covered by
the regular expr=
ession has not been crawled... It's perfect! 

But, when I create a job (or=
 a profile), with an override for the
domain of the seed (http://www.zzz.co=
m.br, in my example), and use the
same filter of the single job, it has not=
 been applied. The URI's that
I don't want, are beeing captured. 

Anybody =
has an idea of what is happening?

Once more, thanks in advance... 

Andr=
=E9 Lanna
